abstract: The moves were part of a broad retrenchment in the subprime lending industry amid mounting loan losses.
snippet: The moves were part of a broad retrenchment in the subprime lending industry amid mounting loan losses.
lead_paragraph: General Electric’s subprime lending unit, WMC Mortgage, closed three centers yesterday and cut 771 jobs — about half of its remaining staff — while the Residential Capital home-lending unit of GMAC announced it would eliminate as many as 700 workers, or 5 percent of its American work force.

headline.main: 2 Subprime Lenders Announce Job Cuts; Call Centers Closed
headline.print_headline: 2 Subprime Lenders Announce Job Cuts; Call Centers Closed
